data.name: Burrow of the Fallen Bear: A Gay Furry Visual Novel Demo
data.detailed_description:
CHECK OUT OTHER GAMES

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1820480/Pact_of_the_Ancients__3D_Bara_Action_RPG/
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1851470/Ikkarus_and_the_Prince_of_Sin/
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1829850/Crystal_Tales_Tactics_Echoes_of_the_Libertas_War/


About the Game


Visual Novel, Dating Sim, Furry, Fantasy, B+B, Choices Matter, Multiple Endings, RPG

  • A branched Visual Novel with more than 50k words;
  • More than 30 unique CGs to unlock;
  • 3 love partners with unique personalities;
  • 18 Unique Endings, including the bad ones;
  • Original Soundtracks for the main characters;
  • A fantasy story with some RPG elements presented in a traditional choice system but with unique behaviors that impact your narrative;

The Burrow of the Fallen Bear's seal is getting weaker and adventurers from the Furland Kingdom are coming to explore the house of one of the most fearful and violent assailants of the story. Now, Krile, a young adventurer, will live his first adventure to show everyone why he should be chosen to save the Furry Heroes. This game takes place before the game mentioned happened and does not require you to have played it to understand this new story.

data.short_description: A gay furry visual novel, full of fantasy and RPG elements. Experience Krile’s journey before he saves the Furry Heroes, Meet 3 unique hot adventurers, Fight with them, Buy items that impact your story, Unlock branches, Explore the Fallen Bear’s burrow. Everything through a classic choice system.

fullgame.name: Burrow of the Fallen Bear: A Gay Furry Visual Novel

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows® 7/8/8.1/10
  • Processor: Windows® 7/8/8.1/10
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 Capable GPU
  • Storage: 350 MB available space
